fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Competition, International co-operation and development, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: EU trade policies, trade and investment agreements including TTIP, TISA and economic partnership agreements, private sector practice and regulation. Competition policy, unfair trading practices in the supply chain, business and human rights, non financial reporting.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations

goals__remit:
Traidcraft is a leading Fairtrade company specialising in making trade work for the poor. In collaboration with local partners we work to create opportunities for poor people to harness the benefits of trade, helping them to develop sustainable livelihoods. 
 
We use this experience to inform our advocacy and campaigning work on trade justice and corporate accountability.
